translation.en: [Bridwell] This is a story that takes place on an island full of wonder.
translation.it: Questa storia si svolge su un'isola piena di meraviglie.

translation.en: The story of two lost souls searching for one another,
translation.it: È la storia di due anime smarrite che si cercano l'una con l'altra,

translation.en: -although they don't know that yet. -[birds chirping]
translation.it: anche se ancora non lo sanno.

translation.en: [Bridwell] Because, you see,
no matter how alone or out of place one feels,
translation.it: per quanto ci si possa sentire soli o fuori posto,

translation.en: magic is all around us if you just know where to look.
translation.it: la magia è ovunque intorno a noi, basta sapere dove cercare.

translation.en: [animal control 1] Easy, girl.
-[whines] -[animal control 1] Hey, Mama. Good girl.
Come on. We're gonna take good care of you.

translation.en: Come on.
[animal control 2] Let's go, gang. We're going to the pound.
[animal control 1] Come on, girl, you're okay.
-Come on, girl. -[whimpering]
-[laughs] -[Florence] Hey, Food Stamp.
-New girl. -[laughs]
[Packard] The last tenant put the unit on Airbnb.

translation.en: We don't play that 'cause we got rules. No subletting, no water beds, and no pets.
translation.it: Ma qui niente subaffitto. E neanche animali o letti ad acqua.

translation.en: -You all got that? -Absolutely, Mr. Packard.
-We won't even drink water in bed. -Hey, 5-C!
translation.it: - Noi neanche beviamo acqua a letto. - Ehi, 5-C!

translation.en: If your mama wants her dishwasher repaired,
translation.it: Se volete che vi ripari la lavastoviglie,

translation.en: tell her try a little grease.

translation.en: -She'll know what I'm talking about. -O-- Okay, Mr. Packard.
translation.it: di' a tua madre di ungere un po' le ruote. Lei capirà. Ok, sig. Packard.

translation.en: Yes, I know it's important
-and I wouldn't ask unless-- -[door opens]
translation.it: e non lo chiederei se non…

translation.en: -[Emily] Hey, Mom. -[door closes]
Yeah, okay, I understand.
Yeah, uh, I'll figure it out. Okay, yeah. Thanks.

translation.en: Packard wants a bribe for the dishwasher.
translation.it: - Packard ci ricatta per la lavapiatti. - Stupendo!

translation.en: Splendid! We can just grab a stack of hundreds. I think they're over there by the gold bars
translation.it: Prendi un paio di centoni. Sono lì accanto ai lingotti

translation.en: that Aunt Irene left us in this rent-controlled flat.
translation.it: che la zia ci ha lasciato in questo appartamento a fitto bloccato.

translation.en: How was your day, sweetheart?
-Somewhere between abysmal and atrocious. -Those are two beautiful words,
translation.it: Un misto tra apocalittico e atroce. Due bellissime parole.

translation.en: which you probably wouldn't use if you didn't go to such a good school.
translation.it: E le sai perché vai a un'ottima scuola.

translation.en: Great! I'll have an epic vocabulary to use in my upcoming decades of therapy.
translation.it: Bene! Ho un ottimo vocabolario da usare nei prossimi decenni di psicoterapia.

translation.en: Okay. It is hard being the new kid at school.
translation.it: Ok. È dura essere la nuova arrivata a scuola.

translation.en: Those other girls still bothering you?
It's mostly just this one girl, Florence.
-She calls me "Food Stamp." -[Maggie] Why?
Maybe because I'm on scholarship, or I'm small,
translation.it: Per la borsa di studio, perché sono bassa, perché veniamo dalla provincia?

translation.en: or because we just moved here from upstate. I don't know.
translation.it: Per la borsa di studio, perché sono bassa, perché veniamo dalla provincia? Non lo so.

translation.en: Well, you're different to those other kids at school.
translation.it: Tu sei solo diversa dagli altri.

translation.en: That's good.
You know, people who are unique, they're the ones that change the world.
translation.it: Sono le persone uniche che cambieranno il mondo.

translation.en: Great! I'll tell Florence that.
Just let me call her mother.
We can have them over here, and we can all talk about it.
translation.it: Le inviteremo qui e ne parleremo.

translation.en: -My gosh, were you ever a child? -No.
Um, but I was bullied, too. You know, you just have to learn to stand up for yourself.
translation.it: Ma sono stata bullizzata anch'io. Devi solo imparare a difenderti.

translation.en: Well, I guess I'm just not as brave as you.
translation.it: Forse non sono coraggiosa come te.

translation.en: I don't want to stand out.
I'm gonna go change and then I'll collect some more cans for the charity drive.

translation.en: Oh, did you talk to your boss about the Chicago thing?

translation.en: Okay, so, apparently, the case has been moved forward two weeks,

translation.en: -and I'm the only paralegal who-- -Mom!
translation.it: e sono l'unico assistente legale… Mamma!

translation.en: I am so sorry. I'm just gonna be gone a couple of days.

translation.en: Really?
translation.it: - Starò via solo un paio di giorni. - Davvero?

translation.en: -Well, who's gonna stay with me? -I'll get a lovely sitter. Yeah?
translation.it: - Chi starà con me? - Troverò qualcuno.

translation.en: Just not Uncle Casey.
[laughs] Are you kidding? Uncle Casey? Who thinks that green M&M's are vegetables?

translation.en: No, no, that is not an option.
[grunts] Wh-- [pants] Coming!
Hey there. Sorry, I was just, uh, grabbing a little power nap,

translation.en: Oh, this is just a temporary thing. I'm in between apartments.

translation.en: -Hmm. Your meter's expired. -Actually, no, the meter is broken.

translation.en: -Actually, no, it's working. -[gasps]
translation.it: - A dire il vero, è rotto. - No, funziona benissimo.

translation.en: It just had this bag over the top of it.

translation.en: -Oh! Who put that there? -Hmm.
[Casey huffs] This city. It is so disheartening.
I'll get rid of that. Do you want to give me that?

translation.en: -Just to-- Okay. -[whimsical music playing]
No, I want to give you this.
Can we do this later? I am so late. Okay. Give it to someone else! Pay it forward.

translation.en: I'm okay. I'm so sorry. I've got to go. [pants]
So late.
Ah! Burn. Burn. [pants]
-[sighs] -[Casey clears throat] Hi.
Casey Porter here to see Mr. Harrington about the illustrator job.

translation.en: Hi. Yeah.
That was at 3:30 and it's… Mm… [clicks tongue] …it's 4:15.

translation.en: Wow. Pretty sure he said Mountain Time, so, guess I'm early.

translation.en: -No. Sorry. -Okay, then…
-are these complimentary? -Sadly, yes.
-[candy rattles] -Lunch.
Idiot!
-Hey! -[Emily] Hey, Malik.
I'm collecting cans and bottles for my school's fundraiser.

translation.en: -Do you have anything? -It's Malik the Magnificent now.
I'm going to magic school. Hey, do you wanna see a trick?

How about you, Mrs. Crullerman? Do you have any cans for me?

translation.en: Here.
-Condensed milk? -Magic school. Good luck.

translation.en: -you know what I'm gonna do? -Make her disappear?
translation.it: Ehi, sai cosa farò quando diventerò bravo con la magia? - La farai sparire? - No.

translation.en: [chuckles] No, I'm gonna cut her in half.
-Oh. Or that. -[door closes]
-Hey, Mrs. Jarvis. -Hi, Emily.

Does Packard know you're collecting canisters in his edifice?

Not if we file a 501(c)(3) in loco parentis.

translation.en: Then, she's protected.

translation.en: You guys must be good lawyers.
Because I don't know what you're talking about.

translation.it: - Ciao, ragazzi. - Alonso, porta le lattine per Emily! - Fallo tu! Io ho da fare. - Io sistemo il tofu!

-Here you go, Emily. -[speaking Spanish]

genius here cuts his hand off with a meat slicer.

It was a sign.
-[groans] Doggone it. -[barks]
-Ah! Get out of here! -[whimpering]
There you are.
Come on.
Now, just because you're lost,

-You understand? -[barking]
Oh, standing up for yourself, are you?
-[barks] -Yes, yes, I know.
You're a dog. [exhales]
Hello.
Now, let's introduce you to all the others, shall we?
Hope they don't mistake you for a lobster.

What? Why are you looking at me like that?
-You know I said I was gonna get a sitter. -[door opens]

translation.en: -Give me some credit. -Till the super fixes it,

[Maggie] Hmm. All set to go.

Are you sure you can handle this?
[in British accent] You're bloody well right I can.
[in normal accent] Oh. You see, if I hadn't moved here when I was two, I would've grown up with a British accent also.

Are you finished?
-Dumbledore. -[Maggie sighs]
-I love you. -[Emily] Love you.
[in normal accent] Look, Mags, I got this, okay?
Got the keys?

-I love you guys. -Love you.
[in British accent] Cheerio!
-[sighs] -Shocking.
[in normal accent] So, how's everything going in…
I'm gonna say fourth grade?
-Sixth. -[Casey chuckles]
Joking. Where's your sense of humor?

translation.en: Hey! I'm gonna make it up to you, okay?
We're gonna do something super cool this weekend.
Money is absolutely no object.

so many people up at this hour?

Whew! Being a kid sucks.
Oh, my gosh. Look, there's an animal rescue tent!

My instinct is, "Sure," so, we probably shouldn't?

-[birds chirping] -[Emily] Wow. So beautiful.

-Hi. -[blows raspberry]
Well, you're kind of creepy.
-[screeches] -Ah! Sorry!
-Hi. -[cat purrs, meows]
Oh, my goodness.
-Whoa! Uncle Casey, there's a sloth! -[Casey] Oh. Hey. My spirit animal.

translation.en: -[Emily gasps] Whoa. -[Casey] Don't touch that.
Why would you put that there?
-Shoo. Go away. -[Emily] Look at you!
Splendid backpack!
-It matches. -Cool.
Well, you are obviously a young lady

Bridwell's the name, and welcome to my Tentus Animalus Rescuus.

translation.en: Is that Latin for "Animal Rescue Tent"?

translation.en: -Makes me sound smartus. -[chuckles]
So, what sort of animals are you looking for?
A temperamental tortoise? A stand-up chameleon?

Perfect! Follow me.
The thing about animals is that the best time to find them

Huh, does this tent seem bigger on the inside?

translation.en: Here we are. [sighs]
This is it.

You're just the cutest thing I've ever seen.

translation.en: Look at you. Aw.
I got you.

I don't know. I found him in the park trying to be a pigeon.

Okay, come on.
